name: AutoLoop
description:
Ludum Dare 47 entry for Autoloop The Game

Autoloop is a Cyberpunk runner genre game with a twist ! Acquire power-ups to hack your way to the finish line ! Or will you ?

Story

You play as Mamüt, an everyday man trying to flee the eternal loop of the everyday life. Willing to give up his humanity for some freedom, he will quickly acquire cyborg body parts to ease his transition. Will he achieve true freedom ? Or will he end up stuck in another loop for some simplicity ?

Team:

3D Artist - Tom Le Lann @vorunah

Audio Artist - Ivan Duprat @Garet

Programming - Kevin Pedatte @kpedatte

Controls
  • Hold Up Arrow to move forward
  • Right and Left Arrow to change lane
  • Hold Down Arrow to shrink, release to unshrink
  • Space to jump
  • R to restart the game
  • ESC to close the game (for now)
Patchnote v1.1
  • The runner won't be stuck in front of a wall anymore
  • The UI is no longer affected by the render
  • You can now close the game with "Esc"
  • The runner has the right material in the back
